viewport.description: Viewport to launch the browser with.

width.description: Width of the viewport with which browser should be launched.

height.description: Height of the viewport with which browser should be launched.

noViewport.description: Let the host OS decide the browser viewport. Note that tests may not be consistent due to varying viewport sizes.

fullPageScreenshotOnFailure.description: Take full page screenshot when test fails.

userDataDirPath.description: The directory to load user preferences from incase of persistent context.

extensionPath.description: The directory to load extensions from incase of persistent context.

useGoogleChrome.description: Run the test using Google Chrome instead of default chromium browser. Note that Google Chrome must be installed on the system where tests are being run.

useMicrosoftEdge.description: Run the test using Microsoft Edge instead of default chromium browser. Note that Microsoft Edge must be installed on the system where tests are being run.

overrideUserAgent.description: Override the default user agent of the browser using the value provided.

fastMode.description: Run tests in fast mode. Note that some steps may fail if the page takes too long to load.

acceptDialog.description: Auto accept browser dialogs and alerts.

closePopups.description: Auto close popups that appear during test execution.

page_timeout.description: Time to wait for the page to load completely.

popupHandlers.description: Locators for handling popups. Includes the locator for the popup and the close button.

stableLocatorStrategy.description: Preferred identification strategy to be while locating elements during runtime.

load_all_lazy.description: If true, will scroll the entire page to load elements which are usually lazy loaded.

uploadsFolder.description: The folder path where uploads would be fetched from during runtime.

find_element_timeout.description: The maximum time to wait while trying to find an element on the page.

networkidle.description: Wait for network to be idle before performing actions on the page.

load.description: Wait for page to be completely loaded before performing actions on the page.

domcontentloaded.description: Wait for DOM Content to be loaded before performing actions on the page.

ariaSnapshotTimeout.description: Timeout while waiting for ARIA snapshot to be captured.

contextOptions.description: Options passed when creating a new Playwright browser context. For available options, refer to the Playwright documentation: https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-browser#browser-new-context

browserOptions.description: A dictionary mapping keys to context option overrides. When a Gherkin scenario has a matching tag that matches with `@browserOptions__<key>`, the corresponding context options will override the default contextOptions.

additionalProperties.description: Context options for scenarios with this tag. These options follow the same structure as contextOptions. Refer to Playwright documentation: https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-browser#browser-new-context
